text: Motion
Motion

Ah, Producer-san.
Are you going for a walk too, Producer-san?

Ah, I had a bit of free time.
Are you joining, Chiyuki?
Yes.

Forget about lessons and embroidery,
I've come to clear my mind.

Having various things you want to do,
it's nice to relax and space out outside, isn't it?

—The start of something new often comes
from these ordinary moments.

Do you ever suddenly get an idea while waiting
for something to heat up in the microwave?
Haha, I know the feeling.
Hehe... yeah.
Sorry for interrupting your important time.

No!
You're not interrupting at all...
Ah, Producer-san.
Hmm, what's wrong?

There's something on your shoulder.
Look—

—A tiny leaf...
Must've drifted over on the breeze.

...Seems like it did.
Thanks, Chiyuki.

Hehe.
You're welcome.
...That just gave me a little idea.
